languageKey.label: SAV Library Kickstarter > Types > Link
Attributes for the type Link
xEXT_sav_library_kickstarter_all:*,xEXT_sav_library_kickstarter_functions:*,xEXT_sav_library_kickstarter_general:*
generateRTF=1;
Sets the RTF generator.
templateRTF=filename;
Defines the template to be used by the RTF generator. Field markers ###tableName.fieldName### or ###fieldName### (for aliases) can be used.
saveFileRTF=filename;
Name under which the generated file will be saved. Field markers ###tableName.fieldName### or ###fieldName### (for aliases) can be used.

In an rtf document, if the field marker ###tableName.fieldName### exists string1 will be replaced by string2. String1 can be NL (for the ASCII character LF). It may be useful when one wants to input data in a textarea and display them in one line with a given separator in the file.
link = string;
The string will be used for the link instead of the field value.
fieldLink = fieldName;
Sets the attribute "link" with the content of the field whose name is given by fieldName.
message = string;
Message associated with the link.
fieldMessage = fieldName;
Sets the attribute "message" with the content of the field whose name is given by fieldName.
